header.gameNote: HALL OF FAME CLASSIC - CAMPUS GAME

articles.description: Michael Oguine had 25 points, including a crucial putback dunk in overtime, and Montana avoided an upset on Saturday night with a 71-69 win over Sacramento State.
articles.headline: Montana avoids upset, beats Sacramento State 71-69 in OT

articles.description: Deon Lyle came off the bench to hit 5 of 8 from 3-point range and score 18 and Giovanni De Nicolao added 10 points, including two free throws with five seconds left, to help UT San Antonio hold off UTEP 63-59 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: UT San Antonio holds off UTEP 63-59

articles.description: Mitchell Hahn scored 21 points and Daniel Norl added 19 points and Omaha beat Fort Wayne on the strength of 12 3-pointers for 90-85 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Hahn, Norl send carry Omaha past Fort Wayne 90-85

articles.description: Jemerrio Jones scored 27 points and matched his career high by snaring 20 rebounds and New Mexico State thrilled a packed home-court crowd by coming from behind to beat Grand Canyon, 74-70 Saturday night to remain unbeaten in the Western Athletic...
articles.headline: New Mexico St. holds off Grand Canyon, 74-70; now 9-0 in WAC

articles.description: Brandon Boyd scored 27 points and Novak Topalovic added 14 while grabbing 13 rebounds as Idaho State took control in the second half, beating North Dakota 82-67 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Idaho State rolls in 2nd half, beats North Dakota 82-67

articles.description: The Razorbacks show out vs. the Commodores behind senior Daryl Macon's 21 points and freshman Daniel Gafford's 16 points, nine rebounds and seven blocks.
articles.headline: Arkansas downs Vanderbilt 72-54

images.caption: The Razorbacks show out vs. the Commodores behind senior Daryl Macon's 21 points and freshman Daniel Gafford's 16 points, nine rebounds and seven blocks.
images.name: Arkansas downs Vanderbilt 72-54
